mapper.insert: insert into moviecomment (movieid, userid, score, createAt, contents) values(#{movieid}, #{userid}, #{score}, now(), #{contents})
mapper.select: select * from moviecomment where movieid = #{movieid} order by createAt desc;
select * from moviecomment where movieid=#{movieid} order by createAt desc limit #{page}, #{limit};
select avg(score) from moviecomment where movieid=#{movieid};
select count(*) from moviecomment where movieid=#{movieid};
